pattern.name: Affinity weighted
pattern.description:
Similar to WoE, but without normalization and transformation with logarithm. For decision trees it should be as informative as WoE, but the calculation should be faster. For interpretability or logistic regression, WoE is still preferred.
Note: - Dependent on target (nominal/numerical). - The inner table should be calculated just once per table. - Multiple columns could be returned. - Weighting: weight=(count(*))^0.5; score=sum(t2.b*t2.weight)/sum(t2.a*t2.weight); doesn't improve Chi2
NOTE: CURRENTLY WORKS ONLY FOR NOMINAL TARGETS (VALUES ARE IN SINGLE QUOTES).
Warning: This pattern is using target values in the calculation. Be careful with splitting of the data into training and testing part.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT t1.@baseId , t1.@baseDate , t1.@baseTarget , sum(t2.b)/sum(t2.a) * sqrt(count(t1.@nominalColumn)) as "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT @nominalColumn , avg(case when @baseTarget = '@targetValue' then 1 else 0 end)+1 as a , avg(case when @baseTarget <> '@targetValue' then 1 else 0 end)+1 as b FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @nominalColumn ) t2 ON t1.@nominalColumn = t2.@nominalColumn GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
